item.title: Shocking surface - is it on your list to fix?, 24th March
item.description:
Your emails to people reporting potholes are full of jargon and make no sense. It's never clear if you're going to repair them or not when you say the issues is cleared. In this case we have ... an extended area of badly damaged road surface in a number of places across an extended area of Prestbury High St. It's along the stretch from Southam Rd to Idsall Drive. I think the full extent of the road needs proper resurfacing, as it's continually being patched up in numerous areas. The current large areas of damage cause cars to swerve dangerously to avoid the poor surface on both sides of the roads. It's worse than a 3rd world country - it's an embarrassment and a disgrace.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 58, High Street, Noverton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road surface on roundabout so bad cars are driving on wrong side of the road. High risk of road traffic accident. Lots of young people in the location due to schools and skate parkon wrong side of road to avoid. This is causing a danger to oncoming traffic includin, 24th March
